About VCIAS

VCIAS (Vegggie Central Intelligence Agency Society) is a serious, highly enthusiastic group that loves veggies,(only the good ones tho) creativity, and community-driven projects. We make stuff, host things sometimes, prototype tiny farming robots, (not anymore) and eventually dress up as giant carrots.

Join VCIAS

We run friendly events, host a small forum, and share resources. No experience required ‚Äî just bring curiosity and maybe a snack.
